snippet.title: Zombie Vikings – Steam  Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Zombie Vikings is coming to Steam December 7! 

From the creators of indie smash hit Stick It to The Man! comes a new one to four-player co-op stab-you-in-the-gut-a-thon. Embark on a dead funny adventure with the Zombie Vikings. A putrid posse sent on a mission through the most epic of worlds to retrieve Odin’s lost eye.
 
The Steam version includes a big update, containing a new Unicorn Pig sidekick, new enemies, weapon stats and much more!

Zombie Vikings site: http://www.zombie-vikings.com
Zoink site and blog: http://www.zoinkgames.com
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/ZoinkGames
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ZoinkGames
